text:
would be great if `is_available_for_new_content` defaults to true when making modules from the CLI. Small headache needing to update the meta file every time you make a module.

<https://community.HubSpot.com/t5/HubSpot-Ideas/Set-is-available-for-new-content-to-true-by-default/idi-p/695677#M123475>
